rules_text:
[i]Snake Spirit [/i]– {T}: Add two mana of any combination of colors.
[i]Capture[/i] – Whenever a creature card is put into an opponents graveyard from their library, exile it. You may cast creature cards exiled with Orochi, Secret Keeper.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Orochi attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, each opponent mills three cards.
